segments.text: Good evening . Do you have a reservation ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , we don't .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How many people are you together ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just two people .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you like to sit in a smoking section , a non-smoking section or whatever comes open first ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We prefer non-smoking section .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am awfully sorry but there are no vacancies left now . Would you like to wait for a moment ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How long a wait do you think there â€™ ll be ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think about ten minutes .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok , we'll wait a while .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am sorry for making you wait so long . Now there is a table available in non-smoking section . Please follow me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This is the menu . Are you ready to order now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I think I'd like to have a tomato sausage soup first . And the same for him , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , and what would you like to drink ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: One goblet of red wine and one bottle of beer please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you like a dessert ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What special kind of desserts do you have ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Lemon pie , hot cake in syrup , chocolate sundae and custard pudding .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I think we will order after we finish the main course .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right . I'll bring your soup right away .
segments.speaker: S1
